data.body:
the auto verifier ran for 81ga, commit 47ae9b3 - the logs show 

[verification] retry bead=foolery-8iga reason=fail-requirements

and sure enough - the work was rejected by codex.

- let's add some notes about the rejected work/commit when this happens.  
- this should generate a notification to the user.
- we should set the 'stage' tag to 'retry' (stage:retry replacing any other stage tags)
- increment the attempts tag if it exists, else set it to attempts:1
- start a new implementation session with the appropriate agent for scene/take

and then continue back into the workflow of implement/followup/verify.
